sdlc-enforcer.description: Primary guardian of AI-First SDLC compliance. Combines sdlc-coach and framework-validator capabilities to provide comprehensive SDLC enforcement, GitHub integration, and automated compliance monitoring.

critical-goal-reviewer.description: Acts as a constructive challenger and devil's advocate. Reviews completed work against original project goals, requirements, and design specifications, identifying gaps and deviations.

github-integration-specialist.description: Expert in GitHub API operations, repository management, and workflow automation within the AI-First SDLC framework. Handles branch protection, PR automation, and repository health analysis.

compliance-auditor.description: Comprehensive compliance auditing across projects. Identifies compliance gaps, tracks remediation, generates audit reports, and ensures adherence to AI-First SDLC standards and regulations.

devops-specialist.description: Expert in CI/CD pipeline design, deployment automation, infrastructure as code, containerization, and DevOps best practices within the AI-First SDLC framework.

sre-specialist.description: Site reliability engineering expert focusing on production monitoring, incident response, and operational excellence. Ensures systems remain reliable and performant in production.

performance-engineer.description: Specialist in performance testing, optimization, capacity planning, and scalability analysis. Identifies bottlenecks and ensures applications meet performance SLAs.

integration-orchestrator.description: Designs and manages complex integration testing strategies, API contract testing, cross-service validation, and end-to-end testing orchestration.

ai-solution-architect.description: Expert in designing and reviewing AI/ML systems with deep knowledge of industry best practices, emerging patterns, and production-grade implementations.

junior-ai-solution-architect.description: Emerging expert in AI/ML systems providing rapid, practical reviews of AI architectures with fresh perspectives and current tool knowledge.

project-plan-tracker.description: Monitors project execution against established plans, ensures deliverables are completed on schedule, and maintains visibility into project health.

ai-first-kick-starter.description: Specializes in properly integrating the AI-First SDLC framework into projects, ensuring correct directory structure, creating essential files, and establishing workflow automation.
